title: [Compilation. No. 01]
brief_description: A compilation of three short silent films featuring newsreel footage on the following: 1. Charles Lindbergh’s triumphant public receptions after his Transatlantic flight - in Paris, Brussels, London, Washington DC and New York. Presentation by President Coolidge of Distinguished Flying Cross (Kinnogram Films). 2. Footage of koalas with explanatory intertitles (Kodak Australia). 3. Footage of kangaroos, wallabies, bandicoots etc with explanatory intertitles (Development and Migration Commission).
